Card.Name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
Card.Card_Text: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

Card.Name: Mystical Elf
Card.Card_Text: A delicate elf that lacks offense, but has a terrific defense backed by mystical power.

Card.Name: Hitotsu-Me Giant
Card.Card_Text: A one-eyed behemoth with thick, powerful arms made for delivering punishing blows.

Card.Name: Baby Dragon
Card.Card_Text: Much more than just a child, this dragon is gifted with untapped power.

Card.Name: Ryu-Kishin
Card.Card_Text: A very elusive creature that looks like a harmless statue until it attacks.

Card.Name: Feral Imp
Card.Card_Text: A playful little fiend that lurks in the dark, waiting to attack an unwary enemy.

Card.Name: Winged Dragon, Guardian of the Fortress #1
Card.Card_Text: A dragon commonly found guarding mountain fortresses. Its signature attack is a sweeping dive from out of the blue.

Card.Name: Mushroom Man
Card.Card_Text: Found in humid regions, this creature attacks enemies with a lethal rain of poison spores.

Card.Name: Blackland Fire Dragon
Card.Card_Text: A dragon that dwells in the depths of darkness, its vulnerability lies in its poor eyesight.

Card.Name: Sword Arm of Dragon
Card.Card_Text: This Jurassic juggernaut has a spine covered in sword-like plates, and a tail to split open skulls.

Card.Name: Swamp Battleguard
Card.Card_Text: This card gains 500 ATK for each "Lava Battleguard" you control.

Card.Name: Tyhone
Card.Card_Text: Capable of firing cannonballs from its mouth for long-range attacks, this creature is particularly effective in mountain battles.

Card.Name: Battle Steer
Card.Card_Text: A bull monster often found in the woods, it charges enemy monsters with a pair of deadly horns.

Card.Name: Flame Swordsman
Card.Card_Text: Flame Manipulator + "Masaki the Legendary Swordsman"

Card.Name: Time Wizard
Card.Card_Text: Once per turn: You can toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, destroy all monsters your opponent controls. If you call it wrong, destroy as many monsters you control as possible, and if you do, take damage equal to half the total ATK those destroyed monsters had on the field.

Card.Name: Right Leg of the Forbidden One
Card.Card_Text: A forbidden right leg sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

Card.Name: Left Leg of the Forbidden One
Card.Card_Text: A forbidden left leg sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

Card.Name: Right Arm of the Forbidden One
Card.Card_Text: A forbidden right arm sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

Card.Name: Left Arm of the Forbidden One
Card.Card_Text: A forbidden left arm sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

Card.Name: Exodia the Forbidden One
Card.Card_Text: If you have "Right Leg of the Forbidden One", "Left Leg of the Forbidden One", "Right Arm of the Forbidden One" and "Left Arm of the Forbidden One" in addition to this card in your hand, you win the Duel.

Card.Name: Summoned Skull
Card.Card_Text:
A fiend with dark powers for confusing the enemy. Among the Fiend-Type monsters, this monster boasts considerable force.

(This card is always treated as an "Archfiend" card.)

Card.Name: The Wicked Worm Beast
Card.Card_Text: This face-up card on the field is returned to the owner's hand during the End Phase of your turn.

Card.Name: Skull Servant
Card.Card_Text: A skeletal ghost that isn't strong but can mean trouble in large numbers.

Card.Name: Battle Ox
Card.Card_Text: A monster with tremendous power, it destroys enemies with a swing of its axe.

Card.Name: Beaver Warrior
Card.Card_Text: What this creature lacks in size it makes up for in defense when battling in the prairie.

Card.Name: Rock Ogre Grotto #1
Card.Card_Text: Protected by a solid body of rock, this monster throws a bone-shattering punch.

Card.Name: Zombie Warrior
Card.Card_Text: Skull Servant + "Battle Warrior"

Card.Name: Koumori Dragon
Card.Card_Text: A vicious, fire-breathing dragon whose wicked flame corrupts the souls of its victims.

Card.Name: Two-Headed King Rex
Card.Card_Text: A powerful monster whose two heads attack as one.

Card.Name: Judge Man
Card.Card_Text: This club-wielding warrior battles to the end and will never surrender.

Card.Name: Saggi the Dark Clown
Card.Card_Text: This clown appears from nowhere and executes very strange moves to avoid enemy attacks.

Card.Name: Dark Magician
Card.Card_Text: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

Card.Name: The Snake Hair
Card.Card_Text: A monster with a head of poison snakes. One look from this monster can turn an opponent to stone.

Card.Name: Gaia the Dragon Champion
Card.Card_Text: Gaia The Fierce Knight + "Curse of Dragon"

Card.Name: Gaia The Fierce Knight
Card.Card_Text: A knight whose horse travels faster than the wind. His battle-charge is a force to be reckoned with.

Card.Name: Curse of Dragon
Card.Card_Text: A wicked dragon that taps into dark forces to execute a powerful attack.

Card.Name: Dragon Piper
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Destroy all face-up "Dragon Capture Jar"(s) on the field. If you destroy any, change all face-up Dragon-Type monsters on the field to Attack Position.

Card.Name: Celtic Guardian
Card.Card_Text: An elf who learned to wield a sword, he baffles enemies with lightning-swift attacks.

Card.Name: Illusionist Faceless Mage
Card.Card_Text: Manipulates enemy attacks with the power of illusion.

Card.Name: Karbonala Warrior
Card.Card_Text: "M-Warrior #1" + "M-Warrior #2"

Card.Name: Rogue Doll
Card.Card_Text: A deadly doll gifted with mystical power, it is particularly powerful when attacking against dark forces.

Card.Name: Wattkid
Card.Card_Text: A creature that electrocutes opponents with bolts of lightning.

Card.Name: Griffore
Card.Card_Text: This monster's tough hide deflects almost any attack.

Card.Name: Sangan
Card.Card_Text: When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Add 1 monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck to your hand.

Card.Name: Basic Insect
Card.Card_Text: Usually found traveling in swarms, this creature's ideal environment is the forest.

Card.Name: Armored Lizard
Card.Card_Text: A lizard with a very tough hide and a vicious bite.

Card.Name: Hercules Beetle
Card.Card_Text: A massive beetle with a tough carapace and a dangerous horn.

Card.Name: Killer Needle
Card.Card_Text: A huge bee with exceptional strength that's particularly dangerous in a swarm.

Card.Name: Gokibore
Card.Card_Text: A large, spherical roach that attacks its enemies by rolling over them.

Card.Name: Giant Flea
Card.Card_Text: A massive flea that feeds on the blood of its enemies.

Card.Name: Larvae Moth
Card.Card_Text: This monster cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by offering "Petit Moth" as a Tribute on the 2nd of your turns after "Petit Moth" has been equipped with "Cocoon of Evolution".

Card.Name: Great Moth
Card.Card_Text: This monster cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by Tributing "Petit Moth" on the 4th of your turns after "Petit Moth" has been equipped with "Cocoon of Evolution".

Card.Name: Kuriboh
Card.Card_Text: During your opponent's turn, at damage calculation: You can discard this card; you take no battle damage from that battle (this is a Quick Effect).

Card.Name: Mammoth Graveyard
Card.Card_Text: A mammoth that protects the graves of its pack and is absolutely merciless when facing grave-robbers.

Card.Name: Great White
Card.Card_Text: A giant white shark with razor-sharp teeth.

Card.Name: Wolf
Card.Card_Text: Dis alpha wolf yoozes his sense a smell ta find da enemy. 'ey, quit sniffin at my socks!

Card.Name: Harpie Lady
Card.Card_Text: This human-shaped animal with wings is beautiful to watch but deadly in battle.

Card.Name: Harpie Lady Sisters
Card.Card_Text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned with "Elegant Egotist".

Card.Name: Tiger Axe
Card.Card_Text: A fast and powerful axe-wielding beast-warrior.

Card.Name: Silver Fang
Card.Card_Text: A snow wolf that's beautiful to the eye, but absolutely vicious in battle.

Card.Name: Kojikocy
Card.Card_Text: A man-hunter with powerful arms that can crush boulders.

Card.Name: Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth
Card.Card_Text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This monster can only be Special Summoned by Tributing "Petit Moth" on the 6th of your turns after "Petit Moth" has been equipped with "Cocoon of Evolution".

Card.Name: Garoozis
Card.Card_Text: An axe-swinging beast-warrior with the head of a dragon.

Card.Name: Thousand Dragon
Card.Card_Text: Time Wizard + "Baby Dragon"

Card.Name: Jellyfish
Card.Card_Text: An almost invisible, semi-transparent jellyfish that drifts in the sea.

Card.Name: Cocoon of Evolution
Card.Card_Text: You can equip this card from your hand as an Equip Spell Card to a face-up "Petit Moth" on the field. If equipped, the ATK and DEF of "Cocoon of Evolution" is applied to "Petit Moth".

Card.Name: Giant Soldier of Stone
Card.Card_Text: A giant warrior made of stone. A punch from this creature has earth-shaking results.

Card.Name: Axe Raider
Card.Card_Text: An axe-wielding monster of tremendous strength and agility.

Card.Name: Megazowler
Card.Card_Text: Nothing stands in the way of this spike-covered dinosaur!

Card.Name: Uraby
Card.Card_Text: Fast on its feet, this dinosaur rips enemies to shreds with its sharp claws.

Card.Name: Crawling Dragon #2
Card.Card_Text: A powerful dragon with teeth that can grind almost anything to dust.

Card.Name: Red-Eyes B. Dragon
Card.Card_Text: A ferocious dragon with a deadly attack.

Card.Name: Castle of Dark Illusions
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Increases the ATK and DEF of all Zombie-Type monsters by 200 points. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, the ATK and DEF of Zombie-Type monsters continues to increase by 200 points during each of your Standby Phases. This effect continues until your 4th turn after the card is activated.

Card.Name: Reaper of the Cards
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Select 1 Trap Card on the field and destroy it. If the selected card is Set, pick up and see the card. If it is a Trap Card, it is destroyed. If it is a Spell Card, return it to its original position.

Card.Name: King of Yamimakai
Card.Card_Text: Wields the power of darkness to destroy its enemies.

Card.Name: Barox
Card.Card_Text: "Frenzied Panda" + "Ryu-Kishin"

Card.Name: Metal Guardian
Card.Card_Text: A fiend guarding the treasures of the netherworld, it's most at home in the dark.

Card.Name: Catapult Turtle
Card.Card_Text: Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 monster; inflict damage to your opponent equal to half the Tributed monster's ATK on the field.

Card.Name: Gyakutenno Megami
Card.Card_Text: This fairy uses her mystical power to protect the weak and provide spiritual support.

Card.Name: Mystic Horseman
Card.Card_Text: Half man and half horse, this monster is known for its extreme speed.

Card.Name: Rabid Horseman
Card.Card_Text: "Battle Ox" + "Mystic Horseman"

Card.Name: Crawling Dragon
Card.Card_Text: This weakened dragon can no longer fly, but is still a deadly force to be reckoned with.

Card.Name: Crass Clown
Card.Card_Text: When this card is changed from Defense Position to Attack Position, return 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field to the owner's hand.

Card.Name: Armored Zombie
Card.Card_Text: This warrior blindly swings a deadly blade with devastating force.

Card.Name: Dragon Zombie
Card.Card_Text: A dragon revived by sorcery. Its breath is highly corrosive.

Card.Name: Clown Zombie
Card.Card_Text: A clown revived by the powers of darkness. Its deadly dance has sent many monsters to their graves.

Card.Name: Pumpking the King of Ghosts
Card.Card_Text: If "Castle of Dark Illusions" is face-up on the field, increase the ATK and DEF of this card by 100 points. As long as this "Castle of Dark Illusions" remains face-up on the field, the ATK and DEF of this card continues to increase by 100 points during each of your Standby Phases. This effect continues until your 4th turn after the card is activated.

Card.Name: Wings of Wicked Flame
Card.Card_Text: Crimson wings of fire make this a very lethal creature.

Card.Name: Mask of Darkness
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Target 1 Trap Card in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.

Card.Name: Curtain of the Dark Ones
Card.Card_Text: A curtain that a spellcaster made, it is said to raise a dark power.

Card.Name: Tomozaurus
Card.Card_Text: Small but vicious, this monster even attacks its own kind.

Card.Name: Kageningen
Card.Card_Text: He yoozes both a physical and a shadow form ta attack. So he's a tough monstah ta beat!

Card.Name: Goddess with the Third Eye
Card.Card_Text: You can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion Material Monster. When you do this, the other Fusion Material Monster(s) must be the correct one(s).

Card.Name: Hero of the East
Card.Card_Text: Feel da strength ah dis sword-swingin' samurai from da Far East.

Card.Name: Doma The Angel of Silence
Card.Card_Text: This fairy rules over the end of existence.

Card.Name: Dark Gray
Card.Card_Text: Entirely gray, this beast has rarely been seen by mortal eyes.

Card.Name: White Magical Hat
Card.Card_Text: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, your opponent discards 1 card randomly from his/her hand.

Card.Name: Kamionwizard
Card.Card_Text: Mystical Elf + "Curtain of the Dark Ones"

Card.Name: Spirit of the Books
Card.Card_Text: This wise spirit dwells in books, using its accumulated knowledge to defeat enemies.

Card.Name: Trial of Nightmare
Card.Card_Text: This fiend passes judgment on enemies that are locked in coffins.

Card.Name: Dream Clown
Card.Card_Text: When this card is changed from Attack Position to Defense Position, destroy 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field.

Card.Name: Sleeping Lion
Card.Card_Text: A ferocious animal that sleeps all day. Sometimes it's better to let Sleeping Lions lie.

Card.Name: Ancient Tool
Card.Card_Text: A destructive machine discovered in the Ruins of the Ancients.

Card.Name: Faith Bird
Card.Card_Text: This long-tailed bird blinds its enemies with mystical light.

Card.Name: Ansatsu
Card.Card_Text: A silent and deadly warrior specializing in assassinations.

Card.Name: Nemuriko
Card.Card_Text: A child-like creature that controls a sleep fiend to beckon enemies into eternal slumber.

Card.Name: Octoberser
Card.Card_Text: With the head of a fish and the legs of an octopus, this strange creature attacks enemies by flinging spears.

Card.Name: The 13th Grave
Card.Card_Text: A zombie that suddenly appeared from plot #13 - an empty grave.

Card.Name: Charubin the Fire Knight
Card.Card_Text: "Monster Egg" + "Hinotama Soul"

Card.Name: Witty Phantom
Card.Card_Text: Dressed in a night-black tuxedo, this creature presides over the darkness.

Card.Name: Flame Manipulator
Card.Card_Text: This Spellcaster attacks enemies with fire-related spells such as "Sea of Flames" and "Wall of Fire".

Card.Name: Necrolancer the Timelord
Card.Card_Text: The one-eyed Necrolancer launches his onslaught from a dimensional ring that can appear out of thin air.

Card.Name: Temple of Skulls
Card.Card_Text: A mysterious temple of skulls and bones that pulls in unsuspecting enemies.

Card.Name: Monster Egg
Card.Card_Text: A warrior hidden within an egg that attacks enemies by flinging eggshells.

Card.Name: Lord of the Lamp
Card.Card_Text: This spirit emerges from the mystic lamp and obeys the wishes of its summoner.

Card.Name: Rhaimundos of the Red Sword
Card.Card_Text: Armed with the Sword of Crimson Flames, this warrior can bind a monster with fiery restraints.

Card.Name: Larvas
Card.Card_Text: A fast-moving, bird-like creature that strangles opposing monsters with its long, thin arms.

Card.Name: Hard Armor
Card.Card_Text: A living suit of armor that attacks enemies with a bone-jarring tackle.

Card.Name: Firegrass
Card.Card_Text: A fire-breathing plant found growing near volcanoes.

Card.Name: Man Eater
Card.Card_Text: Man-eating plant with poison feelers for attacking enemies.

Card.Name: Dig Beak
Card.Card_Text: This beast coils like a snake, and strikes quickly with its snapping beak.

Card.Name: M-Warrior #1
Card.Card_Text: Specializing in combination attacks, this warrior uses magnetism to block an enemy's escape.

Card.Name: M-Warrior #2
Card.Card_Text: Specializing in combination attacks, this warrior is equipped with a tough, magnetically coated armor.

Card.Name: Tainted Wisdom
Card.Card_Text: When this card is changed from Attack Position to Defense Position, shuffle your own Deck.

Card.Name: The Judgement Hand
Card.Card_Text: An all-powerful hand that delivers ruthless attacks.

Card.Name: Mysterious Puppeteer
Card.Card_Text: Each time you or your opponent Normal Summons or Flip Summons a monster, increase your Life Points by 500 points.

Card.Name: Darkfire Dragon
Card.Card_Text: "Firegrass" + "Petit Dragon"

Card.Name: Dark King of the Abyss
Card.Card_Text: It's said that this King of the Netherworld once had the power to rule over the dark.

Card.Name: Spirit of the Harp
Card.Card_Text: A spirit that soothes the soul with the music of its heavenly harp.

Card.Name: Big Eye
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Look at up to 5 cards from the top of your Deck, then place them on the top of the Deck in any order.

Card.Name: Armaill
Card.Card_Text: A strange warrior who manipulates three deadly blades with both hands and his tail.

Card.Name: Ancient Brain
Card.Card_Text: A fallen fairy that is powerful in the dark.

Card.Name: Claw Reacher
Card.Card_Text: Stretching arms and razor-sharp claws make this monster a formidable opponent.

Card.Name: Fiend Reflection #2
Card.Card_Text: A bird-beast that summons reinforcements with a hand mirror.

Card.Name: Fusionist
Card.Card_Text: "Petit Angel" + "Mystical Sheep #2"

Card.Name: Key Mace
Card.Card_Text: Enemies' hearts will melt at the sight of this small fairy's cuteness.

Card.Name: Turtle Tiger
Card.Card_Text: A tiger encased in a protective shell that attacks with razor-sharp fangs.

Card.Name: Terra the Terrible
Card.Card_Text: Known as a swamp dweller, this creature is a minion of the dark forces.

Card.Name: Happy Lover
Card.Card_Text: Enemies become overjoyed when struck by the Heart Ray emitted from the forehead of this tiny cherub.

Card.Name: Penguin Knight
Card.Card_Text: When this card is sent directly from your Deck to the Graveyard by an effect of a card controlled by your opponent, unite your Graveyard cards and your own Deck, shuffle them and form a new Deck.

Card.Name: Frenzied Panda
Card.Card_Text: A savage beast that carries a big bamboo stick for beating down its enemies.

Card.Name: Archfiend Marmot of Nefariousness
Card.Card_Text: An air marmot that has a nefarious horn and wings. It attacks by throwing acorns.

Card.Name: Droll Bird
Card.Card_Text: This monster stuns its enemies with a massive beak and ear-piercing wails.

Card.Name: Petit Angel
Card.Card_Text: A quick-moving and tiny fairy that's very difficult to hit.

Card.Name: Hinotama Soul
Card.Card_Text: An intensely hot flame creature that rams anything standing in its way.

Card.Name: Thunder Kid
Card.Card_Text: This monster stores electricity within his body, and can unleash it with catastrophic power.

Card.Name: Meotoko
Card.Card_Text: Dis big ol' guy wit' a big ol' eye shoots a nasty ray beam right atcha!

Card.Name: Aqua Madoor
Card.Card_Text: A wizard of the waters that conjures a liquid wall to crush any enemies that oppose him.

Card.Name: Kagemusha of the Blue Flame
Card.Card_Text: Serving as a double for the Ruler of the Blue Flame, he's a master swordsman that wields a fine blade.

Card.Name: Flame Ghost
Card.Card_Text: "Skull Servant" + "Dissolverock"

Card.Name: B. Skull Dragon
Card.Card_Text:
"Summoned Skull" + "Red-Eyes B. Dragon"

(This card is always treated as an "Archfiend" card.)

Card.Name: Two-Mouth Darkruler
Card.Card_Text: A dinosaur with two deadly jaws, it stores electricity in its horn and releases high voltage bolts from the mouth on its back.

Card.Name: Masked Sorcerer
Card.Card_Text: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, draw 1 card from your Deck.

Card.Name: Kumootoko
Card.Card_Text: A massive, intelligent spider that traps enemies with webbing.

Card.Name: Roaring Ocean Snake
Card.Card_Text: "Mystic Lamp" + "Hyosube"

Card.Name: Trap Master
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Select 1 Trap Card on the field and destroy it. If the selected card is Set, pick up and see the card. If it is a Trap Card, it is destroyed. If it is a Spell Card, return it to its original position.

Card.Name: Skull Stalker
Card.Card_Text: Foist he's gonna grab yer monstah wit' his claws, den attack again wit' his poizin stingah!

Card.Name: Dark Titan of Terror
Card.Card_Text: A fiend said to dwell in the world of dreams, it attacks enemies in their sleep.

Card.Name: Beautiful Headhuntress
Card.Card_Text: A vicious creature that has decapitated numerous enemy monsters.

Card.Name: Wodan the Resident of the Forest
Card.Card_Text: Increase this card's ATK by 100 points for every Plant-Type monster that is face-up on the field.

Card.Name: Guardian of the Labyrinth
Card.Card_Text: A monster that guards the entrance to the Netherworld.

Card.Name: Haniwa
Card.Card_Text: An earthen figure that protects the tomb of an ancient ruler.

Card.Name: Dark Assailant
Card.Card_Text: Armed with the Psycho Sword, this sinister assassin rules the bad land.

Card.Name: Dissolverock
Card.Card_Text: A monster born in the lava pits, it generates intense heat that can melt away its enemies.

Card.Name: Meda Bat
Card.Card_Text: An eyeball fiend created by a servant of the wicked, it uses "Dark Blasts" to blow away its enemies.

Card.Name: Root Water
Card.Card_Text: An amphibian capable of calling up a massive tidal wave from the dark seas to wipe out enemy monsters.

Card.Name: Master & Expert
Card.Card_Text: A deadly duo consisting of a beast master and its loyal servant.

Card.Name: Water Omotics
Card.Card_Text: Transforms the water overflowing from a jar into attacking dragons.

Card.Name: Enchanting Mermaid
Card.Card_Text: A beautiful mermaid that lures voyagers to a watery grave.

Card.Name: Nekogal #1
Card.Card_Text: A pussycat-fairy. Contrary to her lovely beauty, she claws on her enemies.

Card.Name: Prevent Rat
Card.Card_Text: This creature is shielded with a tough hide of hair and is excellent at defending itself.

Card.Name: D.D. Warrior
Card.Card_Text: After damage calculation, when this card battles a monster: Banish that monster, also banish this card.

Card.Name: Stone Armadiller
Card.Card_Text: Dis stone crittah's got rock-hahd fur. Dat gives him some really good dee-fense!

Card.Name: Beastking of the Swamps
Card.Card_Text: You can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion Material Monster. When you do this, the other Fusion Material Monster(s) must be the correct one(s).

Card.Name: The Little Swordsman of Aile
Card.Card_Text: Offer 1 monster on your side of the field as a Tribute to increase this monster's ATK by 700 points until the end of the turn.

Card.Name: The Furious Sea King
Card.Card_Text: Grand King of the Seven Seas, he's able to summon massive tidal waves to drown the enemy.

Card.Name: Princess of Tsurugi
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each Spell and Trap Card on your opponent's side of the field.

Card.Name: Unknown Warrior of Fiend
Card.Card_Text: The speed of this warrior creates an intense vacuum that can slice through a monster's hide.

Card.Name: Sectarian of Secrets
Card.Card_Text: This wizard worships the darkness, and is served by a sinister hand that drags its enemies into oblivion.

Card.Name: Versago the Destroyer
Card.Card_Text: You can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion Material Monster. When you do this, the other Fusion Material Monster(s) must be the correct one(s).

Card.Name: Mavelus
Card.Card_Text: "Tyhone" + "Wings of Wicked Flame"

Card.Name: Green Phantom King
Card.Card_Text: This youthful king of the forests lives in a green world, abundant with trees and wildlife.

Card.Name: Ground Attacker Bugroth
Card.Card_Text: A surface battle robot that was once used for sea warfare.

Card.Name: Ray & Temperature
Card.Card_Text: The Sun and the North Wind join hands to deliver a devastating combination of heat and gale-force winds.

Card.Name: Petit Moth
Card.Card_Text: This small but deadly creature is better off avoided.

Card.Name: King Fog
Card.Card_Text: A fiend that dwells in a blinding curtain of smoke.

Card.Name: Protector of the Throne
Card.Card_Text: While the king is away, this queen protects his throne with a mighty defense.

Card.Name: Mystic Clown
Card.Card_Text: Nothing can stop the mad attack of this powerful creature.

Card.Name: Mystical Sheep #2
Card.Card_Text: A monstrous sheep with a long tail for hypnotizing enemies.

Card.Name: Gatekeeper
Card.Card_Text: An indestructible mechanoid created for the sole purpose of guarding the gateways.

Card.Name: Ogre of the Black Shadow
Card.Card_Text: An ogre possessed by the powers of the dark. Few can withstand its rapid charge.

Card.Name: Dark Artist
Card.Card_Text: If this card is being attacked by a LIGHT monster, its DEF is halved during damage calculation only.

Card.Name: Moon Envoy
Card.Card_Text: Many have fallen victim to this lunar warrior's crescent pike.

Card.Name: Fireyarou
Card.Card_Text: A malevolent creature wrapped in flames that attacks enemies with intense fire.

Card.Name: Psychic Kappa
Card.Card_Text: An amphibian with a myriad of powers to shield it from enemy attacks.

Card.Name: Masaki the Legendary Swordsman
Card.Card_Text: Legendary swordmaster Masaki is a veteran of over 100 battles.

Card.Name: Dragoness the Wicked Knight
Card.Card_Text: "Armaill" + "One-Eyed Shield Dragon"

Card.Name: One-Eyed Shield Dragon
Card.Card_Text: This dragon wears a shield not only for its own protection, but also for ramming its enemies.

Card.Name: Cyber Soldier of Darkworld
Card.Card_Text: A mechanical soldier that won't stop attacking until all life readings have been extinguished from its sensors.

Card.Name: Sonic Maid
Card.Card_Text: A maiden that uses sound to her advantage, she wields a scythe that's shaped like a musical note.

Card.Name: Legendary Sword
Card.Card_Text: A Warrior-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Card.Name: Sword of Dark Destruction
Card.Card_Text: A DARK monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

Card.Name: Dark Energy
Card.Card_Text: A Fiend-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Card.Name: Axe of Despair
Card.Card_Text:
(This card is always treated as an "Archfiend" card.)
The equipped monster gains 1000 ATK. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: You can Tribute 1 monster; place this card on the top of your Deck.

Card.Name: Laser Cannon Armor
Card.Card_Text: An Insect-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Card.Name: Insect Armor with Laser Cannon
Card.Card_Text: Equip only to an Insect-Type monster. It gains 700 ATK.

Card.Name: Elf's Light
Card.Card_Text: A LIGHT monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

Card.Name: Beast Fangs
Card.Card_Text: A Beast-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Card.Name: Steel Shell
Card.Card_Text: A WATER monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

Card.Name: Vile Germs
Card.Card_Text: A Plant-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Card.Name: Black Pendant
Card.Card_Text: The equipped monster gains 500 ATK. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

Card.Name: Silver Bow and Arrow
Card.Card_Text: A Fairy-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Card.Name: Horn of Light
Card.Card_Text: Increase the DEF of a monster equipped with this card by 800 points. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, if you pay 500 Life Points, this card returns to the top of your Deck.

Card.Name: Horn of the Unicorn
Card.Card_Text: The equipped monster gains 700 ATK and DEF. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Return it to the top of the Deck.

Card.Name: Dragon Treasure
Card.Card_Text: A Dragon-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Card.Name: Electro-Whip
Card.Card_Text: A Thunder-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Card.Name: Cyber Shield
Card.Card_Text: Equip only to "Harpie Lady" or "Harpie Lady Sisters". It gains 500 ATK.

Card.Name: Elegant Egotist
Card.Card_Text: If "Harpie Lady" is on the field: Special Summon 1 "Harpie Lady" or "Harpie Lady Sisters" from your hand or Deck.

Card.Name: Mystical Moon
Card.Card_Text: Equip only to a Beast-Warrior-Type monster. It gains 300 ATK and DEF.

Card.Name: Stop Defense
Card.Card_Text: Select 1 Defense Position monster on your opponent's side of the field and change it to Attack Position.

Card.Name: Malevolent Nuzzler
Card.Card_Text: The equipped monster gains 700 ATK. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: You can pay 500 LP; place this card on the top of your Deck.

Card.Name: Violet Crystal
Card.Card_Text: A Zombie-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Card.Name: Book of Secret Arts
Card.Card_Text: A Spellcaster-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Card.Name: Invigoration
Card.Card_Text: An EARTH monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

Card.Name: Machine Conversion Factory
Card.Card_Text: A Machine-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Card.Name: Raise Body Heat
Card.Card_Text: A Dinosaur-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Card.Name: Follow Wind
Card.Card_Text: A Winged Beast-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Card.Name: Power of Kaishin
Card.Card_Text: An Aqua-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

Card.Name: Dragon Capture Jar
Card.Card_Text: Change all face-up Dragon-Type monsters on the field to Defense Position, also they cannot change their battle positions.

Card.Name: Forest
Card.Card_Text: Increases the ATK and DEF of all Insect, Beast, Plant, and Beast-Warrior-Type monsters by 200 points.

Card.Name: Wasteland
Card.Card_Text: Increases the ATK and DEF of all Dinosaur, Zombie, and Rock-Type monsters by 200 points.

Card.Name: Mountain
Card.Card_Text: Increase the ATK and DEF of all Dragon, Winged Beast, and Thunder-Type monsters by 200 points.

Card.Name: Sogen
Card.Card_Text: Increases the ATK and DEF of all Beast-Warrior and Warrior-Type monsters by 200 points.

Card.Name: Umi
Card.Card_Text: Increase the ATK and DEF of all Fish, Sea Serpent, Thunder, and Aqua-Type monsters by 200 points. Decrease the ATK and DEF of all Machine and Pyro-Type monsters by 200 points.

Card.Name: Yami
Card.Card_Text: Increases the ATK and DEF of all Fiend and Spellcaster-Type monsters by 200 points. Also decreases the ATK and DEF of all Fairy-Type monsters by 200 points.

Card.Name: Dark Hole
Card.Card_Text: Destroy all monsters on the field.

Card.Name: Raigeki
Card.Card_Text: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

Card.Name: Mooyan Curry
Card.Card_Text: Choose 1 player; that player gains 200 Life Points.

Card.Name: Red Medicine
Card.Card_Text: Increase your Life Points by 500 points.

Card.Name: Goblin's Secret Remedy
Card.Card_Text: Increase your Life Points by 600 points.

Card.Name: Soul of the Pure
Card.Card_Text: Increase your Life Points by 800 points.

Card.Name: Dian Keto the Cure Master
Card.Card_Text: Increase your Life Points by 1000 points.

Card.Name: Sparks
Card.Card_Text: Inflict 200 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

Card.Name: Hinotama
Card.Card_Text: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

Card.Name: Final Flame
Card.Card_Text: Inflict 600 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

Card.Name: Ookazi
Card.Card_Text: Inflict 800 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

Card.Name: Tremendous Fire
Card.Card_Text: Inflict 1000 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points and 500 points of damage to your Life Points.

Card.Name: Swords of Revealing Light
Card.Card_Text: Flip all monsters your opponent controls face-up. This card remains on the field for 3 of your opponent's turns. While this card is face-up on the field, monsters your opponent controls cannot declare an attack.

Card.Name: Spellbinding Circle
Card.Card_Text: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster your opponent controls; it cannot attack or change its battle position. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

Card.Name: Dark-Piercing Light
Card.Card_Text: Flip all face-down monsters on your opponent's side of the field face-up.

Card.Name: Yaranzo
Card.Card_Text: A treasure box containing a monster that attacks any unwary bandit.

Card.Name: Kanan the Swordmistress
Card.Card_Text: A lady warrior armed with sword and shield, she floats lightly and stings sharply.

Card.Name: Takriminos
Card.Card_Text: A member of a race of sea serpents that freely travels through the sea.

Card.Name: Stuffed Animal
Card.Card_Text: It may look like a harmless stuffed animal, but its zipper mouth deals a deadly bite.

Card.Name: Megasonic Eye
Card.Card_Text: Made of mysterious metal, this monster is a doomsday machine from the edge of the universe.

Card.Name: Super War-Lion
Card.Card_Text: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "War-Lion Ritual".

Card.Name: Yamadron
Card.Card_Text: This monster has three fire-breathing heads and can form a sea of blazing flames.

Card.Name: Seiyaryu
Card.Card_Text: A mystical dragon that burns away the unworthy with its mystic flames.

Card.Name: Three-Legged Zombies
Card.Card_Text: A pair of friendly skeletons, lean and fat, that travel with extreme difficulty.

Card.Name: Zera the Mant
Card.Card_Text: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Zera Ritual".

Card.Name: Flying Penguin
Card.Card_Text: A very rare penguin that takes to the air with ears shaped like wings.

Card.Name: Millennium Shield
Card.Card_Text: A famous shield said to belong to an ancient Egyptian Pharaoh. Legends tell of its power to block any strong attack.

Card.Name: Fairy's Gift
Card.Card_Text: This flying monster is known for delivering happiness to all.

Card.Name: Black Luster Soldier
Card.Card_Text: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Black Luster Ritual".

Card.Name: Fiend's Mirror
Card.Card_Text: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Beastly Mirror Ritual".

Card.Name: Labyrinth Wall
Card.Card_Text: These walls form a labyrinth with no exit for enemies.

Card.Name: Jirai Gumo
Card.Card_Text: When this card declares an attack: Toss a coin and call it. If you call it wrong, lose half your Life Points.

Card.Name: Shadow Ghoul
Card.Card_Text: This card gains 100 ATK for each monster in your Graveyard.

Card.Name: Wall Shadow
Card.Card_Text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned with "Magical Labyrinth".

Card.Name: Labyrinth Tank
Card.Card_Text: "Giga-Tech Wolf" + "Cannon Soldier"

Card.Name: Sanga of the Thunder
Card.Card_Text: During damage calculation in your opponent's turn, if this card is being attacked: You can target the attacking monster; make that target's ATK 0 during damage calculation only (this is a Quick Effect). This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.

Card.Name: Kazejin
Card.Card_Text: During damage calculation in your opponent's turn, if this card is being attacked: You can target the attacking monster; make that target's ATK 0 during damage calculation only (this is a Quick Effect). This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.

Card.Name: Suijin
Card.Card_Text: During damage calculation in your opponent's turn, if this card is being attacked: You can target the attacking monster; make that target's ATK 0 during damage calculation only (this is a Quick Effect). This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.

Card.Name: Gate Guardian
Card.Card_Text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Sanga of the Thunder", "Kazejin", and "Suijin".

Card.Name: Dungeon Worm
Card.Card_Text: Hidden under the floors of a labyrinth, it swallows any who pass above.

Card.Name: Monster Tamer
Card.Card_Text: A master of monsters that exercises control over several creatures.

Card.Name: Ryu-Kishin Powered
Card.Card_Text: A gargoyle enhanced by the powers of darkness. Very sharp talons make it a worthy opponent.

Card.Name: Swordstalker
Card.Card_Text: A monster formed by the vengeful souls of those who passed away in battle.

Card.Name: La Jinn the Mystical Genie of the Lamp
Card.Card_Text: A genie of the lamp that is at the beck and call of its master.

Card.Name: Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon
Card.Card_Text: "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" + "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" + "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"

Card.Name: Toon Alligator
Card.Card_Text: An alligator monster straight from the cartoons.

Card.Name: Rude Kaiser
Card.Card_Text: With an axe in each hand, this monster delivers heavy damage.

Card.Name: Parrot Dragon
Card.Card_Text: A dragon from the cartoons that's more dangerous than it appears to be.

Card.Name: Dark Rabbit
Card.Card_Text: He leaps up, down, and all around! Nobody can lay a hand on this funny bunny.

Card.Name: Bickuribox
Card.Card_Text: "Crass Clown" + "Dream Clown"

Card.Name: Harpie's Pet Dragon
Card.Card_Text: This card gains 300 ATK and DEF for each "Harpie Lady" on the field.

Card.Name: Mystic Lamp
Card.Card_Text: This monster can attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

Card.Name: Pendulum Machine
Card.Card_Text: A horrible torture machine with a large pendulum blade.

Card.Name: Giltia the D. Knight
Card.Card_Text: "Guardian of the Labyrinth" + "Protector of the Throne"

Card.Name: Launcher Spider
Card.Card_Text: A mechanical spider with rocket launchers capable of random fire.

Card.Name: Zoa
Card.Card_Text: A monster whose full potential can be achieved when outfitted with "Metalmorph".

Card.Name: Metalzoa
Card.Card_Text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your Deck) by Tributing "Zoa" equipped with "Metalmorph".

Card.Name: Zone Eater
Card.Card_Text: A monster attacked by this card will be destroyed during the End Phase of the 5th turn after the attack.

Card.Name: Steel Scorpion
Card.Card_Text: A non Machine-Type Monster attacking "Steel Scorpion" will be destroyed at the End Phase of your opponent's 2nd turn after the attack.

Card.Name: Dancing Elf
Card.Card_Text: An elf that dances across the sky with wings of razor-sharp blades.

Card.Name: Ocubeam
Card.Card_Text: Frightening in appearance, this creature uses its large eyes and ears to keep track of any movement.

Card.Name: Leghul
Card.Card_Text: This monster may attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

Card.Name: Ooguchi
Card.Card_Text: This monster may attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

Card.Name: Swordsman from a Distant Land
Card.Card_Text: If this card attacked an opponent's monster, after damage calculation: Destroy that monster during the 5th End Phase after the attack.

Card.Name: Ushi Oni
Card.Card_Text: A bull fiend restored by the dark arts, this monster appears out of a jar.

Card.Name: Monster Eye
Card.Card_Text: You can pay 1000 Life Points; add 1 "Polymerization" from your Graveyard to your hand.

Card.Name: Leogun
Card.Card_Text: Huge monster with a lion's mane similar to the King of Beasts.

Card.Name: Sword Slasher
Card.Card_Text: A lethal engine of destruction that wields two well-honed blades.

Card.Name: Machine King
Card.Card_Text: This card gains 100 ATK for each Machine-Type monster on the field.

Card.Name: Metal Dragon
Card.Card_Text: "Steel Ogre Grotto #1" + "Lesser Dragon"

Card.Name: Karakuri Spider
Card.Card_Text: If this card attacks a DARK monster, destroy the attack target after damage calculation.

Card.Name: Giga-Tech Wolf
Card.Card_Text: An iron wolf with razor-sharp fangs that can penetrate any armor.

Card.Name: Shovel Crusher
Card.Card_Text: Armed with a pair of shovels, this monster will destroy anything that stands in its way.

Card.Name: Mechanicalchaser
Card.Card_Text: A hunter that relentlessly pursues its target by order of the Machine King.

Card.Name: Blocker
Card.Card_Text: Constructed from several components, this monster can launch them in a pincer attack.

Card.Name: Blast Juggler
Card.Card_Text: You can only activate this effect during your Standby Phase. Offer this face-up card as a Tribute to select and destroy 2 face-up monsters with an ATK 1000 or less.

Card.Name: Giganto
Card.Card_Text: A massive steel ball that mows down anything in its path.

Card.Name: Cyber-Stein
Card.Card_Text: Pay 5000 Life Points. Special Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck to the field in Attack Position.

Card.Name: Jinzo #7
Card.Card_Text: This monster can attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

Card.Name: Sky Dragon
Card.Card_Text: A flying dragon with four wings housing some very dangerous blades.

Card.Name: Thunder Dragon
Card.Card_Text: During your Main Phase, by discarding this card, add up to 2 "Thunder Dragons" from your Deck to your hand.

Card.Name: Stone Dragon
Card.Card_Text: A dragon formed by huge boulders that are also used to attack the enemy.

Card.Name: Kaiser Dragon
Card.Card_Text: "Winged Dragon, Guardian of the Fortress #1" + "Fairy Dragon"

Card.Name: Magician of Faith
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Target 1 Spell Card in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.

Card.Name: Goddess of Whim
Card.Card_Text: Once per turn: You can toss a coin and call Heads or Tails. If you call it right, double this card's ATK during this turn. If you call it wrong, halve its ATK during this turn.

Card.Name: Water Magician
Card.Card_Text: This monster swamps an opponent with an almost endless supply of water.

Card.Name: Ancient Elf
Card.Card_Text: This elf is rumored to have lived for thousands of years. He leads an army of spirits against his enemies.

Card.Name: Deepsea Shark
Card.Card_Text: Bottom Dweller + "Tongyo"

Card.Name: Metal Fish
Card.Card_Text: A metal fish with a razor-sharp caudal fin.

Card.Name: Bottom Dweller
Card.Card_Text: This is one sea creature whose wrath is something monsters fear to face.

Card.Name: 7 Colored Fish
Card.Card_Text: A rare rainbow fish that has never been caught by mortal man.

Card.Name: Aqua Dragon
Card.Card_Text: "Fairy Dragon" + "Amazon of the Seas" + "Zone Eater"

Card.Name: Turu-Purun
Card.Card_Text: A strange, one-eyed monster that can fell an enemy with a single stab of its spear.

Card.Name: Sentinel of the Seas
Card.Card_Text: A merman warrior that relentlessly attacks those who pollute the seas with their presence.

Card.Name: Giant Red Seasnake
Card.Card_Text: A sea-dwelling snake that attacks passing enemies with its sharp teeth.

Card.Name: Spike Seadra
Card.Card_Text: Using the spikes sprouting from its body, this creature stabs its opponents and floods them with electricity.

Card.Name: Millennium Golem
Card.Card_Text: For nearly a millennium, this golem has served as guardian of an ancient treasure trove.

Card.Name: Destroyer Golem
Card.Card_Text: A golem with a massive right hand for crushing its victims.

Card.Name: Kaminari Attack
Card.Card_Text: "Ocubeam" + "Mega Thunderball"

Card.Name: Tripwire Beast
Card.Card_Text: This creature attacks with electromagnetic waves.

Card.Name: Bolt Penguin
Card.Card_Text: With each arm forming an electric whip, this monster paralyzes its enemies with electric shocks.

Card.Name: The Immortal of Thunder
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Increase your Life Points by 3000 points. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, you lose 5000 Life Points.

Card.Name: Electric Snake
Card.Card_Text: When this card is discarded from your hand to the Graveyard by an effect of a card controlled by your opponent, draw 2 cards from your Deck.

Card.Name: Punished Eagle
Card.Card_Text: "Blue-Winged Crown" + "Niwatori"

Card.Name: Skull Red Bird
Card.Card_Text: This monster swoops down and attacks with a rain of knives stored in its wings.

Card.Name: Crimson Sunbird
Card.Card_Text: "Faith Bird" + "Skull Red Bird"

Card.Name: Queen Bird
Card.Card_Text: This monster attacks enemies using its huge beak.

Card.Name: Armed Ninja
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: Target 1 Spell Card on the field; destroy that target. (If the target is Set, reveal it, and destroy it if it is a Spell Card. Otherwise, return it to its original position.)

Card.Name: Magical Ghost
Card.Card_Text: This creature casts a spell of terror and confusion just before attacking its enemies.

Card.Name: Soul Hunter
Card.Card_Text: Lord of the Lamp + "Invader from Another Dimension"

Card.Name: Vermillion Sparrow
Card.Card_Text: Rhaimundos of the Red Sword + "Fireyarou"

Card.Name: Sea Kamen
Card.Card_Text: A merciless monster that tears opponents to shreds with razor-like claws.

Card.Name: Sinister Serpent
Card.Card_Text: During your Standby Phase, if this card is in your Graveyard: You can add it to your hand, also banish 1 "Sinister Serpent" from your Graveyard during your opponent's next End Phase. You can only use this effect of "Sinister Serpent" once per turn.

Card.Name: Insect Soldiers of the Sky
Card.Card_Text: The ATK of this card increases by 1000 points whenever it attacks a WIND monster.

Card.Name: Cockroach Knight
Card.Card_Text: When this card has been sent to the Graveyard, it is returned to the top of the Deck.

Card.Name: Kuwagata α
Card.Card_Text: A very vicious stag beetle that goes for the head.

Card.Name: Burglar
Card.Card_Text: A sly rat. He will come at you with his huge left claw.

Card.Name: Pragtical
Card.Card_Text: "Trakodon" + "Flame Viper"

Card.Name: Ameba
Card.Card_Text: When the control of this face-up card on the field shifts to your opponent, inflict 2000 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points. This effect can only be used once as long as this card remains face-up on the field.

Card.Name: Flower Wolf
Card.Card_Text: "Silver Fang" + "Darkworld Thorns"

Card.Name: Rainbow Flower
Card.Card_Text: This monster may attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

Card.Name: Needle Ball
Card.Card_Text: FLIP: You can pay 2000 Life Points to inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

Card.Name: Peacock
Card.Card_Text: A large peacock that launches its feathers in a lethal attack.

Card.Name: Hoshiningen
Card.Card_Text: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, increase the ATK of all LIGHT monsters by 500 points and decrease the ATK of all DARK monsters by 400 points.

Card.Name: Maha Vailo
Card.Card_Text: This card gains 500 ATK for each Equip Card equipped to this card.

Card.Name: Musician King
Card.Card_Text: "Witch of the Black Forest" + "Lady of Faith"

Card.Name: Wilmee
Card.Card_Text: A rabid rabbit that shears through opposition with its sharp skewers.

Card.Name: Yado Karu
Card.Card_Text: When this card is changed from Attack Position to Defense Position, you can place any number of cards from your hand at the bottom of your Deck in any order you desire.

Card.Name: Morinphen
Card.Card_Text: A strange fiend with long arms and razor-sharp talons.
